metadata.synopsis: Drunk, excited goblin who's guarding Volo and forcing him to sing even though Volo's no singer.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -100.475; 9.281; 431.4254. Talk with Gribbo

0.speaker: Gribbo
0.context: NodeContext: Volo is gone; Guard has no real function so is just a mean, stupid drunk.
